path: Boxes/Temple College Nursing Program/LVN Program/Summer 24/Basic Nursing Skills/Documents/Indwelling Catheter Removal Fill in the Blank.pdf
text: Indwelling Catheter Removal Critical elements are indicated by an asterisk (*) and must be performed satisfactorily to pass the checkoff. Student missing more than 2 non-asterisk items will result in not passing the skill. Fill in the Blank. Verify Healthcare Provider (HCP) ____________ *____________ _____________. Identify self to the client as a ____________ nurse *Identify patient using _______ verifiers *Assess the client for ____________. Explain ____________ to client and provide _____________ Provides ____________ to client throughout procedure. *Apply _____________/clean gloves. Drain urine ____________ into collection bag Empty collection bag into _____________ ____________. *Remove ____________ gloves, wash ____________, and apply clean _____________. Place towel/absorbent pad ____________ legs and ____________ buttocks ____________ tape/cath secure *Apply _____________ to balloon ____________ port and remove all ____________ from catheter _____________. Instruct client to take deep ____________ and ____________ catheter on ____________. Dispose of equipment and remove ____________. *____________ _____________. *Educates: --notifying nurse of ____________ void to measure amount after ____________ following agency policy *Maintains all ____________ measures throughout procedure.
